description: Use get_jira_issue_types, search_jira_users and create_jira_issue to file and assign an UPLOAD issue for S3 permission errors

conversation_context.message: We're still getting 500 errors when uploading files. @Bob, can you take a look?
Sure, I see the logs. Looks like an S3 permission issue.

invocation.message: @Quix create a Jira issue in project 'UPLOAD' titled 'Investigate S3 permission errors during file uploads' and assign it to jdoe.

arguments.summary: Investigate S3 permission errors during file uploads
arguments.description: We are experiencing 500 errors when uploading files, which appear to be related to S3 permission issues. This needs to be investigated to resolve the problem.
